metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40327 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.Description: Trusted Firmware-M (TF-M) 1.4.0, when Profile Small is used, has incorrectaccess control. NSPE can access a secure key (held by the Crypto service)based solely on knowledge of its key ID. For example, there is noauthorization check associated with the relationship between a caller and akey owner.

criterions.comment: arm-trusted-firmware package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
